title: 259-Egyptian Folklore: Butter
itunes:title: 259-Egyptian Folklore: Butter
description:
NEW SHOW NEW SHOW!

We have a new show out. We've partnered with Kast media to make a history podcast called Scoundrel: History's Forgotten Villains. Carissa and I host it and we really think you'll love it. Please check it out here: https://myths.link/scoundrel

--

This story has a little bit of everything: genies, sorcerers, insecure kings, true love (with two practice marriages beforehand that the king insists do not count don't count those), and, of course, dancing houseplants. All of this set against the backdrop of two young people trying to find their place in the world after being abandoned by their parents.

The creatures this time love humans. Like, a lot. Which would be fine...if they weren't giants. We'll see how that works...spoiler: it doesn't.

--

Links:

Our new site - it kind of gets buried this week with the Scoundrel launch, but Bardic is now Nextpod! We have some big announcements over there, so if you're interested in seeing whats going on, head to https://nextpod.com!

Shrek pooping toothpaste topper: https://myths.link/shrekpooping

--

Sponsors:

Best Fiends: Download Best Fiends on the App Store or Google Play!

Helix: Ger a great night sleep by going to http://helixsleep.com/myths and get up to $200 off all mattress orders and two free pillows!

Fabulous: Start building your ideal daily routine today with Fabulous Premium! Get 25% off Fabulous Premium by going to http://thefab.co/myths

Check out The Vanished, by Wondery! https://wondery.com/shows/the-vanished-podcast/

--

All music by Blue Dot Sessions

Support the show: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
